extends Object

Runnable for the linear model association.
Author:
Marc Vaudel

      public static boolean x0

  • Constructor Details

    • LinearModelRunnable

      public LinearModelRunnable​(VariantIterator iterator, VariantList variantList, double mafThreshold, boolean useDosages, ChildToParentMap childToParentMap, Model[] models, PhenotypesHandler phenotypesHandler, IndexedGzWriter outputWriter, SimpleFileWriter resultsIndex, SimpleSemaphore gzIndexSemaphore, SimpleCliLogger logger)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      iterator - The variants iterator.
      variantList - The variants to process.
      mafThreshold - The maf threshold. maf is computed in parents for trios where a phenotype is available and values lower than threshold are not included (inclusive).
      useDosages - If true, dosages will be used when possible, hard calls otherwise.
      childToParentMap - The child to parent map.
      models - The list of the names of the models to use.
      phenotypesHandler - The phenotypes handler.
      outputWriter - The output writer.
      resultsIndex - The writer for the index of the results file.
      gzIndexSemaphore - The semaphore to keep gz file and index synchronized.
      logger - The logger.

      Specified by:
